channel.title: davewiner tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from davewiner.

item.description: @CaseyNewton -- i was reading your article about substack and just when it got interesting, i had to sign up for something i have no interest in signing up for. i would love to know what you think about rss etc, but i'm not going to take the jump and subscribe.

Substack’s Google Reader–esque app is part of “media ecosystem based on different laws of physics,” company says. https://t.co/LKrjescxbO
Comments on the possible new developing RSS/blogging ecosystem.
https://t.co/yiXXPuIXDd https://t.co/9r5FH2b6zz
Ready to Die? Why Most People Flunk the Zelenskyy Test. https://t.co/SPpyttGqkz
The Russia we have lost. https://t.co/FIlNBpXIMm
Zelensky: Russia's children's hospital strike genocide. https://t.co/jHAUQ8Zz2j
John Lennon at 80 - Paul McCartney - full interview with Sean Ono Lennon. https://t.co/FUVAk5Xdew
35 Best HBO Series of All Time. https://t.co/syxkDVvGJB
Autonomous ski lift vehicle for backcountry skiing. https://t.co/FApdUbHxkK

About 20 years ago, in March 2002, we did a deal to bring the NY Times to Radio Userland users via RSS. This is a pivotal moment for RSS, which was still mainly a bloggers thing. From that point on it was for journalism too. https://t.co/2IO5x186o2
A screen shot of my 2002 feed reader including nytimes items. https://t.co/yNTxsNm9NQ
Ukrainian mom lying dead in brutal photo was Silicon Valley tech worker. https://t.co/pFIJb6HcML
@windley no doubt!
They changed the link color on Twitter. It's lighter. https://t.co/mF4SidnakV
Stephen Miller Sues Over Jan. 6 Subpoena of T-Mobile Family Plan. https://t.co/stPPW1vEw4
Trump a pariah? New $100 million bank loan suggests not. https://t.co/AzWA0bp9iz
@ReutersWorld That’s because he has an off ramp of his own in mind.
Substack’s Google Reader–esque app is part of “media ecosystem based on different laws of physics,” company says. https://t.co/LKrjescxbO
@awbjs It's hard to wade through all those words. And in the end who cares. Think of all the money being wasted, and opportunity.
@bschieving yes. me too! but i was raised to believe women were saints. and that took me quite some time to overcome.

I told you they were going to do this. If they manage to kill Zelenskyy, they will say he's a Ukranian hero, and they were fighting to protect him. That's how Putin will put this war behind him. At least 40 percent of Americans will believe him you know including Tucker. https://t.co/tUOFLCatPM
Everyone who says Putin fucked himself is full of shit. Getting out of bullshit with lies is what he excels at. Why do you think DJ Trump admires him so much? Because of his virtue? Integrity? No -- Trump loves Putin's bullshit.
More here.
https://t.co/YbnuY4C20a
And if you want to see a dark comedy about this stuff I can recommend two.
1. Death of Stalin.
2. Wag the Dog.
@markos the revolution was rained out.

The basic question to ask anyone who wants to provide a writing service for you is this: Do I have to use your writing tool? If the answer is no -- go right ahead, they're not locking you in. If the answer is yes -- find a service that doesn't lock you in.
But be ready to pay money for the service that doesn't lock you in. No one is willing to host your stuff for free. If you aren't paying them in cash, you're paying them some other way.
The rise of Canva, the $40 billion design juggernaut. https://t.co/0WVG6oxXUL
